SEARCH

Class Hotel

java.lang.Object
Hotel
public class Hotel extends Object
This class represents a hotel with rooms and reservations.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    Hotel(String name)
    Initializes a new Hotel object with a given name.

      public double getBasePrice()
      Gets the base price of the hotel rooms.
      Returns:
      The base price.

    • addRoom

      public void addRoom(String roomName, RoomType type)
      Adds a room to the hotel with a given name.
      Parameters:
      roomName - The name of the room to add.
      type - The type of the room.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if a room with the same name already exists.

    • removeRoom

      public void removeRoom(String roomName)
      Removes a room from the hotel by its name and ensures that no active reservations exist.
      Parameters:
      roomName - The name of the room to remove.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if there are active reservations.

    • updateBasePrice

      public void updateBasePrice(double newPrice)
      Updates the base price for all rooms in the hotel.
      Parameters:
      newPrice - The new base price.

    • findReservationByGuestName

      public Reservation findReservationByGuestName(String guestName)
      Finds a reservation by the guest's name.
      Parameters:
      guestName - The name of the guest.
      Returns:
      The Reservation object if found; null otherwise.

    • removeReservation

      public void removeReservation(String guestName)
      Removes a reservation from the hotel.
      Parameters:
      guestName - The reservation to remove under the guest name.

    • doesRoomExist

      public Room doesRoomExist(String name)
      Checks if a room with a given name exists in the hotel.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the room to check.
      Returns:
      The Room object if found; null otherwise.

    • getRooms

      public ArrayList<Room> getRooms()
      Gets the list of rooms in the hotel.
      Returns:
      The list of rooms.

    • viewHotelDetails

      public void viewHotelDetails()
      Displays details of the hotel including its name, total rooms, and estimated earnings.

    • viewLowLevelDetails

      public void viewLowLevelDetails()
      Displays and handles the low-level information options in the View Hotel.

    • simulateBooking

      public void simulateBooking(String roomName, String guestName, int checkIn, int checkOut, String discountCode)
      Simulates booking a room for a guest with specified dates.
      Parameters:
      roomName - The name of the room to book.
      guestName - The name of the guest booking the room.
      checkIn - The check-in date.
      checkOut - The check-out date.
      discountCode - The discount code to apply.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if an invalid discount code is provided.

    • removeHotel

      public void removeHotel()
      Removes a hotel if there are no active reservations.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if there are active reservations in the hotel.
